Headline.Text: Thunderstorms in the area Saturday afternoon through late Saturday night

Night.LongPhrase: Overcast in the evening, then partly cloudy late

Day.ShortPhrase: A t-storm around in the p.m.
Day.LongPhrase: Mostly cloudy and breezy; a thunderstorm in spots in the afternoon

Night.LongPhrase: Mainly cloudy and humid with a thunderstorm in a couple of spots

Day.LongPhrase: Humid; a couple of morning showers followed by a thunderstorm in parts of the area in the afternoon; thunderstorms can bring localized damaging wind gusts
Mostly cloudy with a thunderstorm in parts of the area
